Characters/Dialogue/Maru..Wed8...Hannah: I'm glad to have a job at the clinic... I feel like I'm helping people in town.#$e#Dr. {{Harvey}}? She's nice, but not really my type...
Hey, congratulations!$h#$b#I remember the first time Perry told me he had feelings for you...#$b#He was all shy about it, but I knew right away it was serious... he wouldn't say something like that if he didn't mean it!
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..married_Sebast: Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h^Hey, I guess we're sisters now!$h#$e#I'm glad that {{Sebastian}} found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
Hey, I guess we're brothers now!$h^Hey, I guess we're brother and sister now!$h#$e#I'm glad that {{Sebastian}} found a way out of the basement...#$e#I wish you two all the best!
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..summer_Tue...S: {{Sebastian}} is my half-sister, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
{{Sebastian}} hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if she even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a sister but she doesn't act like one.
Perry and I have been doing a seasonal book club.#$b#It's just the two of us, but it's still fun to discuss what we're reading!
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..Thu...Perry: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. Perry's my baby boy. Be nice to him or leave him alone, got it?
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..Thu4...Perry: Perry says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Perry! Did you make dinner?/Perry! You done your chores?/Perry! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Perry came home crying... what'd you do to him?$3
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..fall_Thu...Perr: Perry's the only one I've got, so you best treat him kindly.
I'll really miss that guy...$s#$b#You treat my Perry good, now. You hear me?$u
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..winter_Fri...Pe: Perry sure does like old books. I think he's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..winter_Tue4...P: I just hope Perry has a good life ahead of him. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Characters/Dialogue/Pam..winter_Tue4_inl: Hey. You better be treatin' Perry right on that old farm of yours. He's the only one I got!
Characters/Dialogue/Penny..Thu6...Perry: I wish I could keep a garden, but our yard is such a mess.$u#$e#Maybe I'll live in a place where I can have a garden someday.#$e#Maybe I'll live on a farm! *chuckle*$h
Characters/Dialogue/Penny..dating_Maru_m: Hi, @. {{Maru}} told me the news... I'm happy for you two!$h
Characters/Dialogue/Penny..eventSeen_36_: Oh, pardon this bandage on my hand...$s#$b#I went over to {{Maru}}'s the other day and he showed me a new gadget of his. The darn thing charred my palm!$s
Characters/Dialogue/Penny..fall_Fri6...P: When I was a little boy, my father abandoned us because he said he felt 'trapped'. We haven't seen him since.$s#$b#I'm sorry to make things uncomfortable for you... It's just that this time of year makes me think of it for some reason.$u#$e#Anyway... How's the farming life going?
That was a beautiful wedding. I know {{Maru}} will make you very happy, he's a great person.
Congratulations, @. {{Sam}}'s a lot of fun, I'm sure you'll never have a dull moment!
$d bus#I heard you were responsible for fixing the bus back up. Thank you.|My mother used to drive the bus to calico desert... but the bus stopped working a few years ago. Mayor says there's not enough money in the town coffers, or else he'd have it fixed.$u
Characters/Dialogue/Pierre..Mon4_inlaw_A: Hi, @. How's Albert doing? The shop hasn't been the same without him...
Characters/Dialogue/Pierre..Thu8...Alber: #$1 pierre2#Does Albert look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the father.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
{{Abigail}}'s going through a rebellious phase... I get it.#$e#He'll wise up when he has to make his first mortgage payment!$h
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..Fri...Sabrina: You've met my daughter {{Sebastian}}, right? She lives downstairs.#$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..Fri4...Sabrin: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in {{Sebastian}}'s room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about {{Sebastian}}... she doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about her future very much...#$e#I would talk to her about it but she never opens up to me.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..Fri4_inlaw_Se: {{Sebastian}} told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..Fri_inlaw_Seb: I miss my {{Sebby}}... she was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in her.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..divorced_Maru: {{Maru}} was crying through the night... We're all devastated...$s
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..divorced_Seba: {{Sebastian}}'s back in the basement... what happened between you two?$s
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..fall_Mon...Ma: #$1 RobinMaru#{{Maru}} likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{Maru}} getting along?
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..fall_Mon...Pe: #$1 RobinMaru#Marcus likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and Marcus getting along?
We'll all miss having {{Maru}} around the house, but I'm sure we'll still see him often!
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..married_Sebas: Oh, don't worry... these are tears of joy. I know {{Sebastian}} will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..pamHouseUpgra: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Perry seem really happy.
Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Perry seem really happy.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..winter_Fri_in: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{Sebby}}.
Hey, I'm {{Sam}}. Good to meet you.$h
Characters/Dialogue/Sam..Mon8...Samantha: I'll tell you a secret... my name is legally 'Sammy', not '{{Sam}}'.$10#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
%{{Sam}} is playing a jazzy tune on her guitar.
Maybe I should learn to play the ukulele.#$e#{{Abby}} on the congas and {{Sebastian}} on the steel drums... 'The Pelicans of Paradise'...$s#$e#What's the matter, you look worried.$h
Characters/Dialogue/Sam..Wed6...Sabrina: I've been friends with {{Sebastian}} for a while. She's a pretty cool chick.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Characters/Dialogue/Sam..dating_Sebastia: I heard you and {{Sebastian}} are going out... she better still be coming to band practice every week!
Characters/Dialogue/Sam..married_Sebasti: Wow, I can't believe you and {{Sebastian}} got hitched. Times really are changing...$u#$e#Eh, it's alright, I'm sure she'll still have time to hang out.
Characters/Dialogue/Sandy..Wed...Emil: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emil in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h
Characters/Dialogue/Sandy..married_Emily: How'd the big day go? {{Emily}} came up a while ago and told me all about your plans.#$b#I'll have to come visit you two on the farm sometime!
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Fri8...Sa: What's new?$h#$e#I'll be at the saloon tonight destroying {{Sam}} at pool again.$h
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Thu4...Ma: Why does everyone like Marcus so much? Sure, he's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Tue6...Sa: {{Sam}}'s really outgoing, so when we hang out she does most of the talking.#$b#That's fine with me!||Imagine if {{Sam}} was as reserved as I am... we'd hang out and never say a word.$h||Some people are talkers, others are listeners. I'm more of a listener.
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Wed2...Al: {{Sam}} is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, {{Abby}} is nice too, but...$h#$e#Umm.. nevermind.
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Wed2...Sa: {{Sam}} is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, {{Abby}} is nice too, but...$h#$e#Umm.. never mind.
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Wed2_inla: {{Sam}} is probably my only friend in this town, anymore...
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..Wed6...Sa: You and {{Sam}} are probably my only friends in this town.$s
Characters/Dialogue/Sebastian..winter_Su: I built a snowgoon but Demetrius made me get rid of it... yet Marcus's cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.
Characters/Dialogue/Shane..JojaMart...Sh: %{{Shane}}'s hard at work. She doesn't seem interested in talking.
%{{Shane}} has a glazed look in her eye. She won't speak to you.
Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask {{Elliott}} for advice next time I see her at the saloon.$s

Data/mail..afterArtShow...Liam: Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Liam[#]Liam's Thank-you Note
Data/mail..afterSamShow...Samantha: @,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -{{Sam}}[#]{{Sam}}'s Thank-you Note
Data/mail..elliottBoat...Ellen: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -{{Elliott}}[#]{{Elliott}}'s Note
Data/mail..elliottLetter1...Ellen: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, {{Elliott}}^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife
Data/mail..elliottLetter2...Ellen: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, {{Elliott}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife 2
Data/mail..elliottLetter3...Ellen: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted {{Elliott}}, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, {{Elliott}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife 3
Data/mail..elliottLetter4...Ellen: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've traveled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-{{Elliott}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife 4
Data/mail..elliottLetter5...Ellen: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, {{Elliott}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife 5
Data/mail..elliottLetter6...Ellen: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, {{Elliott}} %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My Wife 6
Data/mail..elliottReading...Ellen: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -{{Elliott}}[#]{{Elliott}}'s Reading

Characters/Dialogue/Jodi..Wed4.Flavor..A: I wish I could spend more time outside, but there's so much work to do.#$e#I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my paw fur soft.#$e#The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy.$s#$e#Ok, bye!
Characters/Dialogue/Kent..Fri4.Flavor..A: I oughta take up fishing. It would give me something to do, keep my paws busy.
Characters/Dialogue/MarriageDialogue..In: Mind if I add some architectural flair to the woodwork around here? My chisel paw is itching!
Characters/Dialogue/MarriageDialogueEmil: A big house, two kids and a parrot... I have my paws full!
Characters/Dialogue/MarriageDialogueMaru: How do you keep your paws so soft with all that farm work?
Characters/Dialogue/MarriageDialogueSeba: I guess I can do the laundry today... You probably have your paws full with running the farm.
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..winter_Thu10.F: @, come closer. I'm cold.$l#$e#My paw pads are so dry from the winter air. I'm sorry about that.$l
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..AcceptGift_(O): Ahh! Be careful with that! Are you touching it with your bare paws?$9#$b#... Sorry... hehe... With proper handling, this will be perfect for an exotic machine I'm building.
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..eventSeen_9_me: How's your paw feeling?#$b#Let me see it... Hey, it looks all better!$h
Characters/Dialogue/Maru..summer_Thu10.F: How do your paws stay so soft with all that farm work?
Characters/Dialogue/Pierre..Sat.FurryFar: If you find any wild produce, I'll take it off your paws for a reasonable price.
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..AcceptGift_(O: Ah, 'Woodcutter's Weekly'... I was hoping to get my paws on the newest issue! They've got all the latest techniques in here!#$b#From one woodcutter to another... Thank you.$h
Characters/Dialogue/Robin..GreenRain.Fla: That rabbit is insane! Why does he have to go out there? We have no idea if this rain is dangerous!$u%noturn
I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens.$h||A chicken will never let you down. People, on the other paw...
Characters/Dialogue/Wizard..Introduction: Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own paws.
Data/mail..SeaAmulet.Flavor..AnthroConfi: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's paw in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -Lewis[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Data/mail..quest10.FurryFarmerFlavor..An: @,^I've heard you've been lending some people your paws around town! Everyone seems really thankful. I'm awarding you this month's "Best Neighbor" award (with a small cash prize). Keep it up! ^   -Mayor%item money 500 501 %%[#]Best Neighbor
Dear @,^^I guess people didn't take to 'Pierre's Prime Produce' like I'd hoped...^^Anyways, here's my old 'Mini-Shipping Bin'.^The next time you get your paws on some produce worthy of the 'Pierre's Prime' luxury brand, maybe you could have them shipped my way?^^   -Pierre%item id (BC)248 %%[#]Pierre's Prime Produce
Data/SecretNotes..24.Flavor..AnthroConfi: It's a page from M. Jasper's book:^^...the creatures, known by some as "Forest Spirits" or "Junimos", are said to appear in abandoned buildings after they've "gone to seed".^^As a general rule... when people leave, and nature begins to reclaim her territory, the Junimos will undoubtedly appear.^^Folk wisdom holds that the Junimos display some kind of resonant affinity with gemstones that are placed inside their little huts...^^Also, it's said that raisins are their favorite food, but they are too shy to take them directly from the paw.^^Of course, all these claims come from dubious, unverified sources... As far as I know, even the mere existence of these creatures has never been proven!

Data/Festivals/summer28..Vincent_y2.Flav: I touched a jelly once and it stung my paw.$2
Data/Festivals/winter8..Haley_spouse.Fla: Brr... my paws are freezing from making this snowman.$l
Data/TV/CookingChannel..26.Flavor..Anthr: Blackberry Cobbler/Blackberry Cobbler! This one always reminds me of Stardew Valley. There's a few days in fall where the valley is overflowing with the most delicious blackberries I've ever tasted. If you can get your paws on some, I'd highly recommend them for this simple cobbler.
Data/TV/TipChannel..22.Flavor..AnthroCon: Get your paws on a fishin' pole and sell your catch! Fishing is a great way to make a little extra cash when you have some down time. The distance your bobber lands from any dry land determines what kinds of fish you'll hook... as well as the location, season, time of day, and weather!
Data/TV/TipChannel..88.Flavor..AnthroCon: Wondering how to get your paws on 'Refined Quartz'? Just put a regular old quartz in the furnace. You'll need a lump of coal to fuel the fire.
Data/TV/TipChannel..169.Flavor..AnthroCo: If you managed to get your paws on a 'rare seed', now's the time to plant it. Although it's said to take all season to grow, reliable sources have told me it actually takes just 24 days. The end result is rumored to be the sweetest fruit in the entire world.
Data/TV/TipChannel..179.Flavor..AnthroCo: Looking to get married? You're going to need a Mermaid's Pendant. Everyone this side of the Gem Sea knows what it means when you give them a Mermaid's Pendant.^Getting your paws on such a pendant can be tricky. Every region seems to have their own custom, but it always has something to do with the beach or ocean.
Data/TV/TipChannel..218.Flavor..AnthroCo: If you've got your paws on a gold pan, keep an eye out for something sparkly in the water.^There's often good ore in there, free for the taking!
Strings/1_6_Strings..TrashCatalogueDescr: Access a free supply of trash decorations. Wash paws after use.

Strings/MovieReactions..Emily_spring_mov: I ate a pawful of nuts to prepare for this movie... brain food!
Strings/Objects..Slimejack_Description.F: He's coated in a very thick layer of slime. He keeps slipping out of your paws!
Strings/Objects..WeddingRing_Description: An old Zuzu City tradition... It's used to ask for another farmer's paw in marriage.

Strings/StringsFromCSFiles..Event=cs=168: Try your paw at some fishing? You could win big.

Strings/StringsFromCSFiles..WateringCan_: In your paws, this can will never run out of water.
Strings/StringsFromMaps..JojaMart=80.Fla: Joja Multipurpose Detergent -- Use it for your laundry, for your dishes, to clean your paws, as a shampoo, and even as toothpaste! Mix it with JojaMeal to make a delicious icing.

I actually lost them while trying to fish an eggshell out of the blender.#Alas... me famous cake batter days are over...
Strings/StringsFromMaps..HarveyRoom=10.F: You didn't find anything, and now your paws smell bad.
Strings/StringsFromMaps..Hospital=3.Furr: It's probably not a good idea to stick your paws in there. It's full of used syringes, dirty swabs, and little nozzles that {{Harvey}} stuck into people's ears.
